name: HomeLearning
0:
”Alexa, start home learning”
”Alexa, launch home learning”
”Alexa, begin home learning”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home learning
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill has practical strategies that work for helping children of all ages who may be struggling with an at-home learning task. Families may find these strategies useful when helping their children complete various reading, math, and/or behavioral tasks at home. To use this guide, think about your child and which strategies may help them learn or practice a new task.
